algorithm_technique: Iterate through the array, maintaining prefix sums parity and counts of even/odd prefix sums.
problem_summary_simple: Count subarrays whose elements sum to an odd number.
problem_summary_technical: Use prefix sums parity. An odd sum subarray is formed by an odd prefix sum minus an even prefix sum.
key_insights: The parity of a sum is determined by the parity of its elements.
An odd sum subarray can be formed by (prefix_sum_odd - prefix_sum_even) or (prefix_sum_even - prefix_sum_odd).
We only need to track the counts of prefix sums that are even or odd.
